transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello? Haan ji sir, sorry wo actually network issue tha. Bataye.
Customer: Hmm. To aapka concern abhi tak matlab kya hai sir, buyleads ko leke concern aa raha hai?
Customer: Ab ye teen din baad jab main aapko phone karunga tab aap mujhe puchenge.
Executive: Sorry sir, actually abhi tak na aapka account mere paas aaya nahi tha isliye maine aapko call nahi kiya. 
Customer: Wahi agar main bolunga, main jhagda karunga tabhi aapke aap aage process karenge. 12 din jhagda karne ke baad wo live hua hai aur uske baad abhi do din ho gaya hai, mera jo dikkat hai koi solve nahi kar raha.
Executive: Sir, I am so sorry sir, main wahi aapko keh rahi hu isliye maine aap se aapka registered mobile number pucha.
Customer: Sorry bolne ka aur aur dusra number dega. Yahi aapka IndiaMART ka service hai.
Executive: No no no sir, yahi number hai aapko jo bhi cheeze chahiye to main aap se concerned hu. To ye number mujhe kyu nahi diya gaya tha?
Customer: To ye number do din se mujhse chupaya kyu gaya tha?
Executive: Sir chupaya to aapko wahi.
Customer: Madam main kya puch raha hu, live hone ke baad aapka duty hai.
Executive: Yes, of course sir.
Customer: Haan, to mujhe message mein Nitu Dubey ka number kyu bheja gaya? Unka duty khatam ho gaya na?
Executive: Sir, main wahi keh rahi hu abhi tak aapka company mujhe map nahi hua tha sir. Aaj subah hi maine check kiya hai mujhe mail aaya hai ki aapka company mujhe map hua hai.
Customer: To ye do din kyu laga raha hai, kya hai dikkat?
Customer: Aur live hone ke baad message bhejne ke liye aapke paas mapping karne ke liye kitna der lagta hai?
Executive: Sir, wo actually posting mein aur product mapping mein thoda time lagta hai sir. I am so sorry.
Customer: Product mapping mein 12 din lagta hai madam?
Executive: Sir, wo actually aapka product mapping mein thoda issue lagta hai sir, production mein KYC hai.
Customer: Kuch issue nahi tha, kuch issue nahi tha.
Customer: Issue create kiya gaya tha.
Executive: I am so sorry sir, aapko jo inconvenience hua uske liye.
Customer: Mujhe commit kya kiya tha, mere paas aapka proposal hai, proposal mein commitment kya tha? Buyleads ke regarding.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Maine aapko ek sawal pucha hai, mujhe jo proposal bheja tha.
Executive: Buyleads ke regarding aapko kya commitment kiya gaya tha sir?
Customer: To aapko pata hona chahiye na, proposal dekho.
Executive: Document mein sir yaha pe aisa kuch document mein ye nahi likha hai na ki kya commitment kiya hai. Buyleads to aapko waha pe likh di hai.
Customer: To main wahi aap se puch rahi hu. To kya hai wo kya hai batao na, yearly nine buyleads hai mere ko aur daily ka one hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ye commitment hai?
Executive: Sir aapko daily aapko ek bonus milta hai buyleads ka, thik hai?
Customer: Haan, wo mujhe mil raha hai. Saat buyleads milti hai. Total aapke paas 17 buyleads hoti hai weekly.
Customer: Saat saat saat buyleads kaha milti hai, weekly milti hai?
Executive: Haan saat milti hai Sunday ko. Every Sunday.
Customer: Aur ek daily bonus milti hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Abhi tak aapke paas jo balance hai wo 10 buyleads balance available hai.
Customer: Wo yearly dikha raha hai. Yearly mujhe 100 ka commitment hai.
Executive: Yearly? Accha ek second. Main wo bhi bata deti hu aapko.
Executive: Yearly aapke paas nine available hai, thik hai? Weekly abhi aapke paas jo abhi next abhi jo Sunday aayega na isme aapko host hoga aur daily bonus wali aapke paas available ek hai. Kyunki daily wo jo daily aapko mil rahi hai na wo daily expire bhi hoti hai. Jo weekly aapko milegi wo next week expire hogi aur yearly aap ye pura saal tak jo hai abhi available hai wo nau buyleads to us pure saal mein aap kabhi bhi use kar sakte ho.
Customer: Lekin wahi 100 buyleads ka commitment hua tha.
Executive: 100 buyleads ka commitment hua tha?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur mujhe ye maine ye pucha Sunil ji ko, to Sunil ji bole ye aapko 48 ya 72 ghante mein deposit ho jayega.
Executive: Okay, to unse jab baat hua tha to uske hisab se abhi 48 ya 72 ghante ke aas paas nahi hua abhi?
Customer: Haan malum hai nahi hua hai, wo wo issue nahi hai, wo ho jayega ye bhi mujhe malum hai. Lekin jo mujhe knowledge nahi hai wo samjhane ke liye kisi ne phone uthana chahiye na.
Executive: Yes, of course, of course. To actually wo sab cheeze main accept kar rahi hu but actually na jab aapka account hame map hota hai hame tabhi right hota hai aapko call karne ke liye. To isliye maine aap se registered mobile number pucha.
Customer: Main jaldi kaha bol raha hu aapki galti hai karke.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir actually aap thoda inconvenience hai na aapko thoda.
Customer: Mere samne hi nahi aa raha hai to main kya karu?
Executive: Of course, I am so sorry. Main apni team ki taraf se bhi aapko sorry bol rahi hu.
Executive: Abhi aapka kuch buyleads aapne consume kiya hai to check kiya aapne subah se?
Customer: Wo maine kiya hai. Jo welcome call hai wo message mein mujhe aaya, mail mein aaya ki aapko sab samjhaye samjhaya jayega wo bhi kyu nahi aaya?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir wo aapko shortly aaj ya kal mein main yaha se welcome call arrange hoga kyunki wo hame yaha pe niche se aapko mail aaya na.
Customer: Profile live hota hai aur char din baad welcome call aata hai to do din pehle profile live karke kya fayda hai?
Executive: Sir isliye kyunki aapke paas jo buyleads wagera ki baat hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Kyunki aapke paas welcome call char din baad hi aana chahiye aapke paas se.
Customer: Haan ji sir?
Customer: Madam welcome call jo rehta hai wo profile live hone ke baad char din ke baad hi aata hai kya?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir kyunki aapke paas na do din ka do ya char din ka time diya jata hai. Aapke paas jo buyleads aati hai na aur jo inquiries aati hai wo do teen jab tak aap matlab hota hai na aap apni taraf se consume kar lenge uske baad hum acche se aapko guide bhi karenge ki sir aapne wo buyleads consume kiya hai ya fir aapke paas hum buyleads share kar rahe hain use aap consume kariye.
Executive: To jaise ki aapke paas mail aa chuka hai mere paas bhi jaise mail aata hai na to hum turant aapka ek welcome call karte hain.
Customer: To wahi nahi aaya hai mere paas.
Executive: Abhi aapke paas welcome call ki mail nahi aaya hai?
Customer: Aata rehta to ye sare sawal main wo call mein nahi puchta.
Executive: Okay to aap aap ek baat bataye aap matlab aaj free hai to main aapko 4 baje ya 5 baje ke aas paas welcome call arrange kar deti hu.
Customer: Abhi welcome call karke kya karna hai, mujhe jo jankari chahiye tha wo mujhe mil gaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir welcome call pe hame jo system mein jo cheeze hai na kaun se buyleads consume karna hai, kaha se aapki personal details aap change kar sakte ho, edit kar sakte ho, product kaise mapping thik kar sakte ho wo sari cheeze bas 5 minute ki hoti hai, jyada nahi hoti hai.
Customer: To abhi karwa do thodi der mein. Welcome call to sir actually wo nahi chahiye matlab welcome call thoda mandate hai.
Customer: To karwa do abhi 5 minute mein arrange.
Executive: 5-10 minute mein kara du main abhi thoda? Ya fir aap free ho jao system se join karenge na aap?
Customer: Haan, karwa do.
Executive: Thik hai to system ya laptop mein aapko na whatsapp ek bar hi kar deti hu jab system ya laptop pe hote hain to within 10 or 20 minutes mein main aapko ek bar link share kar dungi video meet ka google meet ka aap wo join kar lijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Aur abhi sir aapne jo 9696 pe call kiya tha na to uska matlab waha pe jo aapko concern nahi mila maine aapko jo concern de diya hai to uske liye aapke paas ek whatsapp pe feedback ke liye aayega to uska ek bar check.
Customer: IndiaMART ne bahut pareshan kiya IndiaMART ne. Mat bhejo.
Executive: Of course sir but jo resolution aapko waha se nahi mila jo cheeze maine aapko bata di hai thodi bahut jo aapko jo doubt tha to uske liye mere feedback ke liye aayega to please.
Customer: IndiaMART ne bahut pareshan kiya hai.
Executive: Of course sir wo mujhe pata hai but sir please wo wala gussa waha pe mat nikaliega.
Executive: Main aapko share kar deti hu whatsapp pe ek bar aap please check kar lijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has concerns regarding buyleads.

- Wants to know why the welcome call delayed.

- Wants to know why he received another executive's number.

- Commitment of 100 buyleads not fulfilled.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Explained the delay due to account mapping issues.

- Clarified the buyleads structure (daily, weekly, yearly).

- Offered to arrange a welcome call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a Google Meet link on WhatsApp.

- Customer will receive a feedback form on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, welcome call, account mapping, commitment
